label: uncl2151
comment: Code specifying the type of period.

values.label: Quarter
values.comment: A subdivision of a year into four equal parts.

values.label: Half-year
values.comment: A subdivision of a year into two equal parts.

values.label: Air hour
values.comment: Flight duration irrespective of time zones.

values.label: Air day
values.comment: Flight duration irrespective of time zones.

values.label: Calendar day (includes weekends and holidays)
values.comment: Period given as a number of days including weekends and holidays.

values.label: Calendar week (7day)
values.comment: Period given as a number of 7day-weeks including holidays.

values.label: Day
values.comment: The twenty-four hour period during which the earth completes one rotation on its axis.

values.label: Ten days period
values.comment: Period of 10 days.

values.label: Period of two weeks
values.comment: A period of time lasting fourteen days. Synonym: Fortnight.

values.label: Hour
values.comment: One of the twenty-four sub-divisions of a day.

values.label: Half month
values.comment: A subdivision of a month into two equal parts.

values.label: Month
values.comment: One of twelve divisions of the year as determined by the Gregorian calendar.

values.label: Minute
values.comment: A unit of time equal to 1/60 of an hour, or 60 seconds.

values.label: Four month period
values.comment: A period of time, measured in monthly increments, consisting of four sequential months.

values.label: Second
values.comment: A unit of time equal to 1/60 of a minute.

values.label: Surface day
values.comment: The voyage duration irrespective of time zones.

values.label: Indefinite
values.comment: An indefinite period.

values.label: Week
values.comment: Period of seven days.

values.label: Workday
values.comment: Day on which work is usually done.

values.label: 5 day work week
values.comment: Monday through Friday.

values.label: Year
values.comment: The period of time as measured by the Gregorian calendar in which the earth completes a single revolution around the sun.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Period as per agreement.
